DESCRIPTION
       sl  Displays  animations  aimed  to  correct  users who accidentally enter sl instead of ls.  SL
       stands for Steam Locomotive.

DESCRIPTION
       nvim is a text editor based on Vim.  Start nvim followed by any number of options and/or files:

DESCRIPTION
       ps displays information about a selection of the active processes.  If you want a repetitive
       update of the selection and the displayed information, use top instead.
